org.openntf.domino.logging

Interface IOpenLogItem

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseOpenLogItem, DominoOpenLogItem

    public interface IOpenLogItem
    Author:
    withersp

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IOpenLogItem.DebugLevel
      Enum to define debug level if errors are encountered writing the log - do nothing, print summary to console or print full details to console
      static class  IOpenLogItem.LogType
      Enum to define log type

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void debugPrint(Throwable ee)
      This method decides what to do with any Exceptions that we encounter internal to this class, based on the olDebugLevel variable.

      This is the method that does the actual logging to the OpenLog database.

      • getStackTrace

        ArrayList<String> getStackTrace(Throwable ee,
                                int skip)
        Retrieves the stack trace of an Exception as an ArrayList without the initial error message. Also skips over a given number of items (as determined by the skip parameter)
        Parameters:
        ee - Throwable passed into the OpenLogItem
        skip - number of elements to skip
        Returns:
        ArrayList of elements of stack trace
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 4.0.0

      • getStackTrace

        ArrayList<String> getStackTrace(Throwable ee)
        Gets the Stack Trace from a Throwable, passing to getStackTrace(Throwable, int) passing 0 as second parameter.
        Parameters:
        ee - Throwable passed into the OpenLogItem
        Returns:
        ArrayList of elements of stack trace

      • logError

        void logError(Session s,
              Throwable ee,
              String msg,
              Level severityType,
              Document doc)
        Logs an error with extended options using the passed Session.
        Parameters:
        s - Session to log the error against
        ee - Throwable to be logged
        message - message to be logged
        severityType - Severity level, @see setSeverity(Level)
        doc - Document to be added as a link to the OpenLog document
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 4.0.0

      • logError

        String logError(Throwable ee)
        The basic method used to log an error. Just pass the Exception that you caught and this method collects information and saves it to the OpenLog database.
        Parameters:
        ee - Throwable to be logged
        Returns:
        the error message
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 4.0.0

      • logErrorEx

        String logErrorEx(Throwable ee,
                  String msg,
                  Level severityType,
                  Document doc)
        A More flexible way to send an error to the OpenLog database.
        Parameters:
        ee - Throwable to be logged
        msg - Specific error message to be logged
        severityType - Severity level, @see setSeverity(Level)
        doc - Document to be added as a link to the OpenLog document
        Returns:
        message logged in
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 4.0.0

              Throwable ee,
              String msg,
              Level severityType,
              Document doc)

        Parameters:

        ee - Throwable to be logged

        severityType - Severity level, @see setSeverity(Level)

        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 4.0.0

      • setMessage

        Since:

      • setOlDebugLevel

        void setOlDebugLevel(IOpenLogItem.DebugLevel newDebugLevel)
        Sets the new debug level. A String is used because the value is initially set from a properties file Right now the valid debug levels are:
        • 0 -- internal errors are discarded
        • 1 -- Exception messages from internal errors are printed
        • 2 -- stack traces from internal errors are also printed
        Parameters:
        newDebugLevel - new debug level for any errors generated when creating log document
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 4.0.0

      • setSession

        void setSession(Session s)
        Sets the Session property of the OpenLogItem.
        Parameters:
        s - Session
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 4.0.0

      • setSeverity

        void setSeverity(Level severity)
        Sets the severity for the current OpenLogItem.
        Parameters:
        severity - java.util.logging.Level Options:
        • Level.SEVERE
        • Level.WARNING
        • Level.INFO
        • Level.CONFIG
        • Level.FINE
        • Level.FINER
        • Level.FINEST
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 4.0.0

      • setThisAgent

        void setThisAgent(String fromContext)
        Sets the agent / page the error comes from
        Parameters:
        fromContext - String context the error log is coming from
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 4.0.0
